changesets.comments: cgame: made country flags smaller, fixes #404
cgame: made country flags smaller, fixes #404

journals.notes:
I don't think moving the flags "2 pixels" to the right is necessary.

Have a closer look at https://www.dropbox.com/s/b2wynbqacf192tn/Screenshot%202013-11-22%2022.22.56.png
The "[" character actually starts from the center of the space required for character, but most characters start a bit more on the left side (see Rafal nickname on the picture).

details.name: description
details.old_value:
You can test our new flags at etlegacy.com on port 27962.

Two problems with the current higres flags I see:

# They have a "shiny" effect, which makes them a bit too bright, so they should be replaced with the regular 2d flags. Example: !shiny_vs_flat.png!
# They should be made a few pixels smaller and moved a pixel or two to the right.
details.new_value:
You can test our new flags at etlegacy.com on port 27961.

Two problems with the current higres flags I see:

# They have a "shiny" effect, which makes them a bit too bright, so they should be replaced with the regular 2d flags. Example: !shiny_vs_flat.png!
# They should be made a few pixels smaller and moved a pixel or two to the right.

journals.notes: Shiny ones look a lot better than the plain ones..

subject: Adjust the high resolution country flags
description:
You can test our new flags at etlegacy.com on port 27961.

Two problems with the current higres flags I see:

# They have a "shiny" effect, which makes them a bit too bright, so they should be replaced with the regular 2d flags. Example: !shiny_vs_flat.png!
# They should be made a few pixels smaller and moved a pixel or two to the right.
